questions.question: Considering the overall design, what best describes the style of this ring?

What appears to be the primary material used for the ring band?
What kind of setting secures the main gemstone, judging from the visual details?
Disregarding the gemstone, what is the general profile of the ring band?
What decorative elements are visible on the gemstone's setting, excluding the prongs?
What best characterizes the overall luminosity of the main gemstone?

Considering only visible features, describe the ring's design aesthetic as minimalist or ornate?
